title: my friend just brought tahm kench (thatseviper02) and he went on sale 10 minutes after
body:
{{champion:223}} if he submits a support ticket will riot do anything? {{champion:223}} 



{{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

replies.body:
Probally not.

All sales are announced prior to happening via the News Feed.
lmao thank you he said he didn't know there was a news feed I'm like how are you level 30 and you don't know that there was a news feed {{champion:223}} {{item:3073}}
